DOC.brief_summary: The investigators intent to recruit 80 attention deficit hyperactivity disorder families. The attention deficit hyperactivity disorder families had received executive function training one year before.They will be randomized to intervention group and control group using a block randomization design. The intervention group will participate in intensive executive function training immediately,while the control group will receive executive training after 3 months.
